name: market for sawnwood, softwood, raw | sawnwood, softwood, raw | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12769/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'sawnwood, softwood, raw', in the Global geography.;This represents the global market for sawnwood, raw. It is considered that this product is an intermediate one, and is directly consumed within the planing facility.;The product 'sawnwood, softwood, raw' represents sawn softwood (i. e. beams, boards, and laths). Production takes place at a sawmill. Sawnwood is used as a construction material, for the production of wooden furniture, glued laminated timber, and wooden boards. Sawn softwood is further air dried or kiln dried to reduce the moisture content. 

With the production of the sawnwood, raw in the planning facility.

With the product taken care within the same facility (drying).
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
